website_summaries.verdict: Comfort is king with these well-fitting and highly durable boots.
pros: Thermofit moldable liners provide a custom fit
Easy-to-adjust laces are reinforced to help them last longer
Metal hooks hold laces in place all day
cons: Some buyers complain that the boots allow a bit of heel lift

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are good shoes for the price. I would say I am a definite 10.5 in shoe size, and these fit pretty well. They aren't as big as some rentals I've had which were 11s, so that is a plus. I've worn them twice now and they have been comfortable with the right socks and haven't really gotten any major scuffs or damage, so they seem pretty sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Softer boots. Work well with system bindings
customer_reviews.text: Good value. Not the stiffest boots but I figure that when buying. I'd say it was a pretty comfortable ride for the day, paired with the System bindings. But the boot was annoying the back of my calves by the end of the day. They are more comfortable when worn not to tight. Got the job done and the seem a good enough quality to last for years
customer_reviews.author: Brian H.

customer_reviews.title: Great boot for the occassional boarder
customer_reviews.text: Bought these boots to go snowbaording in Winter Park. Didnt feel like wearing boots that a 1000 other people have worn. Found these to be pretty comfortable and worked well with the rented board. I dont get to snowboard as often as I'd like but at around $100 these boots are a good investment.
customer_reviews.author: Trip

customer_reviews.title: Warm an great fit.
customer_reviews.text: Great boots I just used them boarding an super comfortable an warm.
customer_reviews.author: christian lee

customer_reviews.title: For casual rider
customer_reviews.text: The sizing is on the small size and the boot is not very stiff. There is heel movement. The boot is great for price and casual snowboarding. If I were still trying to be aggressive on my board, this boot would not make the cut. Overall, I’m happy with the purchase. It meets my needs and riding style.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: Liked the product alot. I'm from Hawaii so only get to do 2 boarding trips a year. I'm gonna test out my new boots in January for my first trip. I put them on with snowboard socks and was really surprised how comfortable they were for brand new boots. I'll give a review after I wore them a couple times. But, for the price I'm really stoked.
customer_reviews.author: MNaito

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the purchase. These are pretty comfortable for snowboard boots.
customer_reviews.author: ArshWar

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots for even better price
customer_reviews.text: These boots were amazing when i first wore them. they kept my feet war and i didn’t have any problem with putting them on. these are perfect for wide feet too. the only downside is that the laces are so long and when are hitting bumps on the board it is kinda hard. other than those though these boots are solid and definitely a great product for its low price
customer_reviews.author: Coaltyn

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Like the boots. Fit good on my board. Good quality too.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: A little stiff at first but they break right in
customer_reviews.author: mike anderton

customer_reviews.title: Good boot, bad liner
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product for the price, but I fell the the liner could use some work, it move around a lot in the boot
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: No exchanges
customer_reviews.text: The boots seemed good. I ordered a size too small on accident but am not able to exchange it without being charged more than what I paid for it. Very frustrating from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Casey U.

customer_reviews.title: Boots are to big
customer_reviews.text: Material is cheap and way to big..should be a size 13 not a 12
customer_reviews.author: Gerrit

customer_reviews.title: Will not work well for snowboarding
customer_reviews.text: The material is low quality. There is no stiffness to the boot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: System APX Men's Snowboard Boots
product_meta.description: System APX Snowboard Boots : System is back with their APX Snowboard Boots. This ultra durable boot combines superior comfort with peak performance. Simple and classic styling allows these boots to optimize features like metal hooks for superior lace hold and lasting power. Combined with the newest tech like the Thermofit heat moldable liners for customizable fit and an articulating cuff for smooth flex, you just can't find a better quality boot. Built in flex panels allow for fun, easy riding and keep the boot from bulging. The System APX also features space age waterproofing to keep your feet dry and warm on even the coldest and most wet of days. And, as always, System stands by their products with an unheard of 3 year warranty on everything they produce. Shred harder, longer, and dryer this season with the System APX Snowboard Boots.
feature_bullets: Liner: Thermofit Heat Moldable Get the perfect fit from your boots, eliminate pressure points, and ride in comfort all day! The heat mold liner allows the boot to adapt to every curve of your foot perfectly. The APX is simply one of the best fitting, and most comfortable boots on the market.

Lacing: Reenforced Traditional Laces The APX uses traditional lacing to allow riders to easily keep the boot tight in all the right places. Traditional laces allow riders to tighten each section of the boot separately for the perfect fit. Special smoothed metal hooks help hold your laces tight for the entire day while eliminating abrasion to your laces making the boot last even longer!
Warranty: 3 Years A three year warranty against manufacturer defects guarantees that this will be one of the longest lasting boot
